Name: Escape Dream
About the game: You need to go to work but you are stuck in a dream!? No matter how much you get hurt or die, what if you are trapped in a endless dream and never wake up!? Help the character in order to wake up! Game Features It consists of 8 stages, and you should control the character to reach the destination. There are stages you need to clear with different difficulty. You will meet lot of traps and monsters. So you need to find some items to escape from them. You will need to solve some quiz. So you need to think a lot. If you're stuck on a quiz, always take a good look at the map. There may be a skill that could help you with the quiz or the next stage. Or There may be a different way to go to the next stage.. Some 'Save Point' will make you play easy. Acquire various skills to avoid obstacles. Use the recovery skills to recover safely. Never easy nor impossible to escape the dream! My sister also cleared it... So put the anger away and have fun with the game.
